title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Fruita, Colorado
content:
Photo submitted by Pierre J. Mawet, “Top of Colorado National Monument. Beautiful scenery but Very hot day with Garmin registering 105 degrees.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a […]
